name: dissipation
content:
dissipation noun
(DISAPPEARING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] formal the process of gradually disappearing: He sees a growing dissipation of our cultural values. Scientists say the dissipation of the El Niño weather pattern in the Pacific in recent months is likely to bring more hurricanes sweeping up the Atlantic coast.
[ U ]
  physics
  specialized loss of energy, for example when something cools down: The energy balance reveals a continuous dissipation of energy. The wavy edge to the discs is claimed to improve heat dissipation. See
dissipate
